no_results.body: Check your spelling or try searching for a different brand.
no_results.title: Brand not found

options.title: New with tags
options.description: A brand-new, unused item with tags attached or in the original packaging.

options.title: New without tags
options.description: A brand-new, unused item without tags or original packaging.

options.title: Very good
options.description: A lightly used item that may have slight imperfections, but still looks great.

options.title: Good
options.description: A used item that may show imperfections and signs of wear.

options.title: Satisfactory
options.description: A frequently used item with imperfections and signs of wear.
